snippet: Sweet Briar College, a century-old women’s liberal-arts college near Lynchburg, announced Tuesday that it will close in August.
abstract: Sweet Briar College, women's liberal-arts college in rural area near Lynchburg, Va, says it will close due to falling enrollment and financial problems.
lead_paragraph: Sweet Briar College, a century-old women’s liberal-arts college near Lynchburg, announced Tuesday that it will close in August.

headline.main: Virginia: Women’s College Will Close Over Finances
headline.print_headline: Virginia: Women’s College Will Close Over Finances
